body:
from http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&t=3736&p=146837#p146837.. .

I don't know if someone has already suggested this, but It would be very nice if we could browse only cards of a specific cube in card explorer or deck editor screens. Why not a new filter option on the filter bar?

I suggest this because I like to play with cards of a specific set. It would be very interesting to be able to browse cards only from Gatecrash, for example.

I know it's possible to make cubes for specific sets (As a matter of fact, I have just created some with a help from Excel and some basic search functions), but I would like to browse the card images in game.

Is that possible in any way?
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Add cube filter to card explorer/deck editor.
